channel.title: Buying Items
channel.description: How do you change how many items you get while buying things from shops? Also with withdrawing. Example: You click "Buy 10" but it actually buys 50. Example: You click "Withdraw 5" but it actually withdraws 25. Withdraw 1 actually works. Thanks!

item.title: Buying Items
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

How do you change how many items you get while buying things from shops? Also with withdrawing.
Example: You click “Buy 10” but it actually buys 50.
Example: You click “Withdraw 5” but it actually withdraws 25.
Withdraw 1 actually works.
Thanks!
